ygData.subject: A start as a fletcher
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi fellow fletchers of Norrath, I m just starting out fletching and havin spent some practice points in the skill while leveling I started out at 13, as my
ygData.messageBody:
Hi fellow fletchers of Norrath,

I'm just starting out fletching and havin spent some practice points in the skill while leveling I started out at 13, as my first increase brang me to 14. I tried the class A arrow, the ones with all the 1cp parts and raised my skill to 16 where they are now trivial for me to make.

I'm wondering if any of you keeps track of the differents "trivial" caps related to arrows and bows they make, for me to try them in increasing order.

Although I'm wondering if any combination is a valid one or if only some will work. I guess it's the later so first, what is needed for class B arrows? (or the arrows or bow you're currently making).

Thanks,

Thormael
